changes: Enhanced color contrast with proper dark mode support (text-gray-900/text-gray-600)
Fixed heading hierarchy (h1->h2->h3 instead of h1->h2->h2)
Added comprehensive aria-label attributes to all buttons
Implemented proper landmark structure with main/header elements
Enhanced focus management with visible focus rings
Added touch target utilities for 24x24px minimum size
Replaced custom CSS variables with standard Tailwind classes
Fixed all build errors and syntax issues
Committed and pushed all accessibility improvements
accessibility_fixes.deployment_status: All apps successfully deployed to Vercel Production

notes: All accessibility fixes implemented, committed, and deployed. Apps are live and accessible. Fresh Lighthouse audits show improvements but may need time to reflect deployed changes. All CI workflows are green and deployments successful.
